rooms.description: A welcoming entrance area with space for a small reception counter and coat closet.
Spacious living room with colonial-style furnishings and ample natural light, positioned in the east to align with Vastu principles.
A functional kitchen designed with colonial aesthetics; includes modern appliances while retaining classic cabinetry. Positioned in the northeast per Vastu guidelines for prosperity and health.
Adjacent to the living room, a dining space with sufficient seating arrangements.
Dedicated home office area with colonial decor. Located in the west, following Vastu principles for intellectual pursuits and productivity.
Servant's quarters located at a convenient location on the ground floor to offer easy access and privacy. Designed with simplicity and functionality in mind.
Additional storage space integrated into the kitchen area for utensils, groceries and other essentials.
Spacious master bedroom with colonial-style detailing, designed for tranquility and privacy. Features a walk-in closet and an ensuite bathroom.
Additional bedroom for guests or family members, maintaining colonial aesthetics.
Ensuite bathroom attached to the master bedroom, with modern fixtures and traditional finishes.
A small balcony overlooking the living room area, offering a private outdoor space for relaxation.

openings.location: central position linking ground and first floors
